item.title: Buy or sell: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three stocks to buy next week - Mint
item.description:
Sumeet Bagadia Recommends Three Stocks to Buy Next Week

Date: January 14, 2023
Source: Live Mint

Sumeet Bagadia's Stock Picks

In the wake of a decline in the Indian stock market, Sumeet Bagadia from Choice Broking recommends three stocks for investors: Coal India Limited, BSE, and Tata Steel.

Key Points:

  • The Indian stock market closed lower for the third consecutive session.
  • Bagadia indicates a cautious market sentiment with Nifty 50 facing resistance at 23,500 points.
  • Recommended stocks include:
  • 1) Coal India Limited: Buy at ₹387.65, target ₹430, stop loss ₹368.
  • 2) BSE: Buy at ₹5998.75, target ₹6650, stop loss ₹5690.
  • 3) Tata Steel: Buy at ₹130.28, target ₹146, stop loss ₹122.

Notable Quotes:

"Investors should maintain a stock-specific approach. Breaking above the resistance is crucial for improving market sentiments." - Sumeet Bagadia

Conclusion:

Investors are advised to take a cautious yet strategic approach with these stock recommendations as market conditions fluctuate.

item.title: RBL Bank Q3 Results: Net profit sinks 86% to ₹32 crore on high provisions, NII up 3% YoY; NPA improves marginally - Mint
item.description:
RBL Bank Q3 Results: Net profit sinks 86% to ₹32 crore on high provisions, NII up 3% YoY; NPA improves marginally

Date: January 18, 2024 | Source: LiveMint

RBL Bank reported a significant drop of 86% in net profit for Q3 FY25, while its net interest income increased by 3% year-on-year. NPA figures show a slight improvement.

  • Net profit for Q3 FY25 is ₹32.6 crore, down from ₹233.1 crore last year.
  • Net interest income (NII) rose to ₹1,585 crore.
  • Gross NPA ratio increased to 2.92% but remains lower than 3.12% from a year ago.
  • Net NPA ratio decreased to 0.53%.
  • Provisions jumped to ₹1,189 crore from ₹458 crore year-on-year.
  • Exceptional net gain of ₹144.15 crore from selling a 10% stake in DAM Capital.
“We remain cautious about the short-term challenges emanating from macro-economic environment affecting certain unsecured lending segments,” said R Subramaniakumar, MD & CEO, RBL Bank.

Overall, RBL Bank's management highlighted a commitment to growth while maintaining a customer-centric approach.

item.title: Jio Coin launched? User claims Mukesh Ambani's new cryptocurrency is live and 'you can accumulate coins on - The Economic Times
item.description:
Jio Coin launched? User claims Mukesh Ambani's new cryptocurrency is live and you can accumulate coins.

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Jio Platforms, led by Mukesh Ambani, has reportedly launched a new reward token called JioCoin on the Polygon blockchain network. The launch has sparked discussions on its potential uses, though the company has not yet disclosed official details about the token’s functionality.

  • JioCoin is integrated into JioSphere and rewards users for browsing online.
  • Currently, the token is not transferable or redeemable.
  • It may be used for services such as mobile recharges or purchases at Reliance gas stations in the future.
  • The launch comes amid strict regulations on cryptocurrencies in India.
  • Jio Platforms serves over 450 million users, playing a significant role in India's digital economy.
— simplykashif (@simplykashif)

The future of JioCoin remains uncertain but could have significant implications as it becomes integrated into Jio's ecosystem.

item.title: Bonus issue + share split: Stock under Rs 300 to trade ex-date next week - Ratio, record date - ET Now
item.description:
Bonus issue + share split: Stock under Rs 300 to trade ex-date next week - Ratio, record date

Updated on: Jan 18, 2025

Shares of a micro-cap company, BN Rathi Securities, will be trading ex-date for a bonus issue and stock split next week. The board has set a record date for these corporate actions.

  • BN Rathi Securities will issue 1 bonus share for each share held as of the record date.
  • A total of 2,07,50,000 bonus shares will be issued.
  • The record date for determining eligibility for the bonus shares and stock split is set for January 24.
  • The stock will be split in a 1:2 ratio, reducing the face value from Rs 10 to Rs 5.
  • Current share price is under Rs 300, with recent fluctuations noted on the BSE.
"The split is aimed at enhancing liquidity and making shares more economical for investors."

This announcement from BN Rathi Securities is geared towards increasing shareholder participation and market accessibility.

item.title: Stocks to buy under ₹100: Experts recommend five shares to buy on Monday — 20 January 2025 - Mint
item.description:
Stocks to buy under ₹100: Experts recommend five shares to buy on Monday — 20 January 2025

Publication Date: 20 January 2025   Source: Live Mint

Introduction

The Indian stock market faced its third consecutive decline due to weak global sentiments, but experts have identified five promising stocks under ₹100 to consider buying this Monday.

Key Points

  • The Nifty 50 index fell by 108 points to 23,203, while the BSE Sensex dropped 423 points to 76,619.
  • Smaller stocks showed resilience with gains in the Nifty Mid-cap 100 and Nifty Small-cap 100 indices.
  • Market experts recommend five stocks under ₹100: South Indian Bank, Arihant Capital Markets, IDBI Bank, IRB Infrastructure Developers, and Paramount Communications.
  • Key upcoming factors include corporate earnings results and Donald Trump's inauguration affecting market sentiment.

Notable Quotes

“The short-term trend of the Nifty 50 index remains weak amidst range movement.” - Nagaraj Shetti
“Traders are advised to adopt a sell-on-bounce strategy unless Bank Nifty holds above 49,910.” - Hrishikesh Yedve

Conclusion

Investors are advised to monitor both the market trends and expert recommendations closely as new developments unfold.

item.title: New Himalayan Rival Unveiled At Auto Expo! - MotorOctane
item.description:
TVS Launches Exciting New Adventure Motorcycle at Auto Expo

Publication Date: January 2025
Source: MotorOctane

The Indian motorcycle industry is on the rise as TVS unveils its latest model, the TVS ADV, featuring a powerful new 300cc engine and an adventurous design.

  • The TVS ADV features a muscular design inspired by the Ducati Multistrada.
  • It comes equipped with a 299cc engine producing 35 bhp and 28.5 Nm of torque.
  • The motorcycle showcases a half-fairing design with advanced safety features like switchable dual-channel ABS.
  • The launch price is expected to be around Rs 2.8 lakh, competing with models like KTM ADV 250 and Bajaj Dominar 250.
“The new motorcycle is expected to launch this year, marking a significant entry into the adventure segment.”

The launch of the TVS ADV marks a notable development in the growing Indian adventure motorcycle market, promising enhanced performance and style.

item.title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai shares congratulatory message for Amazon founder Jeff Bezos - The Times of India
item.description:
Google CEO Sundar Pichai shares congratulatory message for Amazon founder Jeff Bezos

Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

In a recent statement, Google CEO Sundar Pichai extended his congratulations to Amazon founder Jeff Bezos on his achievements in the tech industry. Pichai's message highlights the spirit of innovation and collaboration in the tech community.

  • Sundar Pichai praises Jeff Bezos for his visionary leadership.
  • The congratulatory message emphasizes innovation and competition.
  • This interaction highlights positive relations in the tech industry.
"The tech industry thrives on innovation, and your contributions have been remarkable." - Sundar Pichai

This message reflects a mutual respect within the technology sector, as leaders acknowledge each other's contributions to the industry.

item.title: VinFast VF 6 Revealed In India At The Auto Expo 2025 - CarDekho
item.description:
VinFast VF 6 Electric SUV Unveiled at Auto Expo 2025 in India

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: CarDekho.com

The VinFast VF 6, a new electric SUV, made its debut in India at the Bharat Mobility Global Expo 2025. This vehicle aims to combine futuristic design with practical electric performance.

  • The VF 6 features a front-wheel-drive (FWD) system and has a claimed range of up to 399 km.
  • The compact SUV can accommodate up to five passengers.
  • It utilizes a 59.6 kWh battery pack, promising a range of around 410 km.
  • Its launch in India is anticipated in September, with prices starting around Rs 35 lakh (ex-showroom).

The VinFast VF 6 showcases a modern aesthetic with plush interiors equipped with advanced features including a 12.9-inch touchscreen and auto AC. It comes with multiple safety features including advanced driver-assistance systems.

Source: CarDekho.com

item.title: Did Trump just drop $TRUMP meme coin on Solana? Token explodes to $8 billion market cap in less than three hours - Crypto Briefing
item.description:
Did Trump just drop $TRUMP meme coin on Solana? Token explodes to $8 billion market cap in less than three hours

Publication Date: January 18, 2025

Source: Crypto Briefing

President-elect Donald Trump launched the Official Trump ($TRUMP) meme coin on Solana, which saw its market cap reach $8 billion in under three hours, raising concerns about the authenticity of the announcements.

Key Takeaways

  • $TRUMP meme coin reached a market cap of $8 billion within two hours of launch.
  • Authenticity concerns arose due to the official announcement being shared on social media.

“Same Cloudflare setup, same deployment with Heroku, same SSL certificate issuer. Very similar HTML structure as before,” says Cygaar, a blockchain engineer.

Slorg, a member of Jupiter’s Core Working Group, confirmed that $TRUMP has been verified and listed on Jupiter Exchange.

“But to keep people safe, this is the real Trump coin. We have approved it to the Jupiter strictlist,” said Slorg.

What we know so far?

The $TRUMP token has a total supply of 1 billion units, with 200 million available at launch. The rest will be released gradually over three years.

item.title: Scoop! New Toyota Fortuner Rival To Be Unveiled Today! - MotorOctane
item.description:
New MG Majestor SUV to Compete with Toyota Fortuner Unveiled at Auto Expo

Publication Date: Today Source: MotorOctane

The new MG Majestor SUV was officially unveiled at the auto expo today, featuring a design inspired by the Maxus LDV 90 and targeted at competing with the Toyota Fortuner.

  • The Majestor will be sold under the MG 'Select' showrooms in India, separate from the Gloster model.
  • Design highlights include a bold grille, aggressive headlamps, and a redesigned interior with premium features.
  • Powertrain options are expected to include a 2.0-litre diesel engine paired with an 8-speed automatic gearbox.
  • The new model aims for a competitive pricing strategy against the existing Gloster SUV.
MG will shed light on the powertrain details of its new Majestor at the auto expo.

The MG Majestor is set to make waves in the SUV market with its competitive features and pricing, showing MG's commitment to expanding its product range.

item.title: What does Donald Trump’s second term mean for Indian stock market? EXPLAINED with five crucial points - Mint
item.description:
What does Donald Trump’s second term mean for Indian stock market? EXPLAINED with five crucial points

Publication Date: January 18, 2025 | Source: Live Mint

Introduction: As Donald Trump prepares for his second term, the Indian stock market is poised for potential shifts influenced by his administration's economic policies. Investors are particularly concerned about tariffs, trade agreements, and geopolitical tensions affecting the market landscape.

Trump 2.0: Top 5 Points

  • Dent to green stocks: Asia's energy transition may be hindered, putting pressure on India's solar and green energy stocks.
  • Advantage for defence stocks: Increased focus on tech-enabled defence sectors is expected to benefit Indian defence companies.
  • Pressure for export-oriented companies: Protectionist policies might challenge sectors like textiles and IT, advising caution in large-cap investments.
  • Advantage for fintech stocks: Stricter immigration policies may enhance tech talent retention in Asia, benefiting fintech innovation.
  • Advantages for infra rail stocks: Potential shifts in manufacturing from China to India could drive demand for infrastructure and rail logistics.

Notable Quote: "Donald Trump's protectionist tariff policy is expected to pose a challenge for export-oriented segments" - Anshul Jain, Head of Research at Lakshmishree Investment and Securities.

Conclusion: Investors should stay alert as Trump's second term could significantly influence various sectors in the Indian stock market, requiring careful analysis and strategy.

item.title: Passenger and railway officer clash over ₹50 change; viral video triggers outrage - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Passenger and railway officer clash over ₹50 change; viral video triggers outrage

Date: Jan 18, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

A heated confrontation between a passenger and a CCTC officer over ₹50 change has gone viral, provoking a range of reactions online.

  • A passenger filmed a CCTC officer refusing to give change.
  • The officer stated he had no change available despite visible ₹20 notes.
  • The passenger demanded his money back, leading to a standoff.
  • Comments on the video reflect public criticism of the officer's actions.
A user remarked, “The soul of the nation has perished.”

The incident has sparked discussions on the reliability and treatment of passengers by railway officials.

item.title: Musk hosts Indian bizmen, says 'open to lowering India-US trade barriers' - Business Standard
item.description:
Musk Hosts Indian Bizmen, Says 'Open to Lowering India-US Trade Barriers'

Publication Date: January 17, 2025   Source: PTI

During a meeting at SpaceX’s Starbase in Texas, Elon Musk engaged with top Indian business figures, expressing a willingness to reduce trade barriers between the US and India to foster economic growth.

Key Points

  • Elon Musk hosted a delegation of Indian entrepreneurs including Ritesh Agarwal (OYO) and Kalyan Raman (Flipkart).
  • The meeting aims to enhance trade relations between India and the US.
  • Musk expressed optimism about the future trajectory of bilateral ties.
  • Discussions included potential roles for Musk in the new US administration.

Notable Quotes

“Things are trending positive. I’m certainly in favour of lowering trade barriers to increase commerce between the US and India.” - Elon Musk

Conclusion

The meeting signifies a growing collaboration between India and the US in technology and trade, highlighted by Musk's commitment to fostering a more interconnected business environment.

item.title: Jio Coin: Mukesh Ambani-led RIL's crypto entry? All about Jio Platforms’ partnership with Polygon Labs - ET Now
item.description:
Jio Coin: Mukesh Ambani-led telco's crypto entry? All about Jio Platforms’ partnership with Polygon Labs

Publication Date: Jan 18, 2025 Source: etnownews.com

India’s richest person Mukesh Ambani-led Jio Platforms recently announced its partnership with internet technology company Polygon Labs. The announcement has sparked widespread interest in 'JioCoin', with users speculating its potential uses.

  • Jio Coin is a potential digital currency tied to Jio's services.
  • Rumors suggest it could be used for mobile recharges and purchases at Reliance gas stations.
  • The partnership with Polygon Labs aims to enhance Jio's offerings through blockchain and Web3 capabilities.
  • This collaboration could allow Jio users to enjoy enhanced privacy and control over personal data.
  • Jio caters to over 450 million customers, potentially expanding their services through this digital currency.
“Joining forces with Polygon Labs marks a significant milestone in Jio's journey towards digital excellence. We are excited to explore the boundless possibilities of Web3 and bring unparalleled digital experiences to our users.” - Kiran Thomas, CEO, JPL

This partnership signifies Jio's entry into the crypto industry, as Polygon Labs is a leading player in blockchain technology.
